Equipment Actions.Action 1: Hooves, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 11 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Horn, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Unicorn makes 2 attacks, one with its Hooves and one with its Horn
Other Actions.Action 2: Healing Touch, The Unicorn touches another creature with its horn and magically heals the target
Other Actions.Action 3: Teleport, The Unicorn teleports itself and willing creatures to a location it is familiar with

Abilities.Ability 1: Charge, The Unicorn moves at least 20ft in a straight line and hits a target with a Horn attack, the target takes an additional Average 9 Piercing damage and can be knocked prone
Abilities.Ability 2: Innate Spellcasting, The Unicorn can cast a few spells
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Weapons, The Unicorn's weapon attacks are magical

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Hooves, The Unicorn makes one attack with its Hooves
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Shimmering Shield, The Unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature, raising their defense
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Heal Self, The Unicorn magically heals itself

Lair Actions.Action 1: Open nonmagical flames are extinguished, torches and campfires refuse to light.  The Unicorn's magic protects its forest
Lair Actions.Action 2: Creatures that belong to the Unicorn's domain have an easier time hiding from intruders
Lair Actions.Action 3: Healing spells are maximized for good-aligned casters
Lair Actions.Action 4: Curses afflicting good-aligned creatures are suppressed
